text: 'ina 'arsalna 'ilykm- ya 'ahl "mk"- mhmdana rasulana shahdana ealaykum bima sadar minkum min alkufr walesyan, kama 'arsalna musaa rasulana 'iilaa alttaghiat frewn, fkdhdhab fireawn bmwsa, walam yumin brsalth, wesa amrh, fahlknah 'ihlakana shdydana. wafi hdha tahdhir min mesyt alrasul mhmd, salaa allah ealayh wslm; khashyat 'ana yusib aleasy mithl ma 'asab fireawn wqwmh
